law.text: The provisions of this act are applicable to all guardianships, whenever created, except that a guardian who qualifies prior to July 1, 1999, shall have the power to make conveyances of his ward's estate only in accordance with the laws in effect on June 30, 1999. The limitation of the preceding sentence shall not be applicable to a guardian in office on June 30, 1999, who requalifies after that date.
